column5: Had 5 great days of walleye fishing. Fishing improved a little each day. Most fish were pretty shallow (less than 15' and in many cases less than 10'). Biggest walleye was 27". Also a 25 incher. Lots of fish between 20-23 and seemingly countless numbers in 14 - 18 range. Did notice smoke rising near us one day on way back to cabin and within the hour planes were working on that small fire. Found out there were actually 5 small fires in our area. Rained most of night the next night and took care of those fires but it was smokey in our area. Highly recommend this lake and this outfitter.
